00004 namespace mlpack
00005 {
00006 namespace amf

00008 class SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning
00009 {
00010  public:
00011   SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning(double u = 0.001,
00012                                    double kw = 0,
00013                                    double kh = 0)
00014           : u(u), kw(kw), kh(kh)
00015     {}
00016 
00017   template<typename MatType>
00018   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00019   {
00020     (void)rank;
00021   
00022     n = dataset.n_rows;
00023     m = dataset.n_cols;
00024 
00025     currentUserIndex = 0;
00026   }
00027 
00052   template<typename MatType>
00053   inline void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00054                       arma::mat& W,
00055                       const arma::mat& H)
00056   {
00057     arma::mat deltaW(n, W.n_cols);
00058     deltaW.zeros();
00059     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00060     {
00061       double val;
00062       if((val = V(i, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00063         deltaW.row(i) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00064                                          arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00065       if(kw != 0) deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00066     }
00067 
00068     W += u*deltaW;
00069   }
00070 
00080   template<typename MatType>
00081   inline void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00082                       const arma::mat& W,
00083                       arma::mat& H)
00084   {
00085     arma::mat deltaH(H.n_rows, 1);
00086     deltaH.zeros();
00087 
00088     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00089     {
00090       double val;
00091       if((val = V(i, currentUserIndex)) != 0)
00092         deltaH += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00093                                                     arma::trans(W.row(i));
00094     }
00095     if(kh != 0) deltaH -= kh * H.col(currentUserIndex);
00096 
00097     H.col(currentUserIndex++) += u * deltaH;
00098     currentUserIndex = currentUserIndex % m;
00099   }
00100 
00101  private:
00102   double u;
00103   double kw;
00104   double kh;
00105 
00106   size_t n;
00107   size_t m;
00108 
00109   size_t currentUserIndex;
00110 };

00112 template<>
00113 inline void SVDIncompleteIncrementalLearning::
00114                                     WUpdate<arma::sp_mat>(const arma::sp_mat& V,
00115                                                           arma::mat& W,
00116                                                           const arma::mat& H)
00117 {
00118   arma::mat deltaW(n, W.n_cols);
00119   deltaW.zeros();
00120   for(arma::sp_mat::const_iterator it = V.begin_col(currentUserIndex);
00121                                       it != V.end_col(currentUserIndex);it++)
00122   {
00123     double val = *it;
00124     size_t i = it.row();
00125     deltaW.row(i) += (val - arma::dot(W.row(i), H.col(currentUserIndex))) *
00126                                          arma::trans(H.col(currentUserIndex));
00127     if(kw != 0) deltaW.row(i) -= kw * W.row(i);
00128   }
00129 
00130   W += u*deltaW;
00131 }
